title: Full Show (LeBron on Sarver, Zeke wants Cowboys to commit to run, Luka top player under 25 to build team around)
description:
00:00 LeBron speaks out on Phoenix Suns owner Robert Sarver being fined and suspended for a year.
21:21 Ezekiel Elliott says the Cowboys need to commit to the run if they want to win without Dak
55:06 NBA execs name Luka Doncic the top player under 25 to build a team around. Do you agree?
1:09:25 Can Baker and the Panthers bounce back against Daniel Jones and the Giants?
1:19:56 The Cowboys have yet to rule out Michael Gallup for Week 2. How would his return provide juice to the Cowboys offense?
1:32:14 Ryan Fitzpatrick says Brady never showed up respect or shook his hand when they played against each other
1:42:10 Stephen Curry was named the most revered Bay Area athlete ever. Should he be over legends Jerry Rice and Joe Montana?
1:49:31 Will Aaron Rodgers throw his receivers under the bus if the team continues to struggle?
1:54:58 Who are you picking in Chargers vs Chiefs tonight?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
